name: Y Files Onboarding
description:
You've passed the first round of interviews to transfer from your current division to the impressive Y-Files Cryptid Division. Can you pass the onboarding exam, and join their ranks?

Very short quiz-style visual novel for the Bad Games Jam!

--------------------------------------------------------------

The initial idea was based off a dream I had, in a much more Typing Of The Dead style, featuring random answers from a HUGE selection to preset questions regarding exploring a haunted village that led to a MUCH deeper lore and story.

However, that's ambitious. and this is the first game I've ever made, so I scaled it back....a LOT.

The cursing = bad concept was also in my dream, and MUCH funnier when I was unconscious.
